unnormalised: Real Estate & Property: Rental Agreement Update!
normalised: Real Estate and Property: Rental Agreement Update!

unnormalised: Hey folks, renting in Mumbai just got a tad more important! Landlords, tenants - listen up! Did you know that a properly drafted rental agreement can save you from a whole lot of drama down the line, like Chintu uncle arguing over the Diwali decorations hanging outside his rented 1BHK?
normalised: Hey folks, renting in Mumbai just got a tad more important! Landlords, tenants - listen up! Did you know that a properly drafted rental agreement can save you from a whole lot of drama down the line, like Chintu uncle arguing over the Diwali decorations hanging outside his rented one B H K?

unnormalised: New rules are coming into play regarding stamp duty on rental agreements. Rs. 500 stamp duty is a thing of the past in some areas! Talk to your local lawyer to avoid headaches.
normalised: New rules are coming into play regarding stamp duty on rental agreements. Rupee five hundred stamp duty is a thing of the past in some areas! Talk to your local lawyer to avoid headaches.

unnormalised: Make sure your agreement clearly states the rent amount, the deposit (that’s your security, you know!), and the responsibilities of both parties. Things like maintenance, repairs, and who pays the electricity bill (important, especially with Mumbai summers!) need to be crystal clear.
normalised: Make sure your agreement clearly states the rent amount, the deposit (that is your security, you know!), and the responsibilities of both parties. Things like maintenance, repairs, and who pays the electricity bill (important, especially with Mumbai summers!) need to be crystal clear.

unnormalised: Also, specify the notice period. Don’t want to be surprised when Mrs. Sharma decides to move out overnight after complaining about the leaky tap for six months!
normalised: Also, specify the notice period. Do not want to be surprised when Missus Sharma decides to move out overnight after complaining about the leaky tap for six months!

unnormalised: A well-defined agreement protects everyone's interest. It also prevents disputes over things like, say, unauthorized construction in your 500 sq ft rented space.
normalised: A well-defined agreement protects everyone's interest. It also prevents disputes over things like, say, unauthorized construction in your five hundred square feet rented space.

unnormalised: Even Dr. Iyer from IIT suggests you carefully read the fine print.
normalised: Even Doctor Iyer from I I T suggests you carefully read the fine print.

unnormalised: Think of it as your 'ghar ka agreement', but on paper and legally binding!
normalised: Think of it as your 'ghar ka agreement', but on paper and legally binding!
